Author: BEDBulimic
Text: Hey there, I’m sorry things feel out of control. Unfortunately I don’t have much advice but I’m here with you and I’ve also increased the size and frequency of my b/p lately.   I really encourage you to see a health professional as they can give you better qualified advice, but in the meantime you could also crosspost to r/fuckeatingdisorders as there may be more people there who have recovered / in recovery. Take care x
